content.en: Predictive Pituitary Algorithms: Machine learning algorithms have shown promise in predicting various outcomes in patients with pituitary adenomas. These algorithms can identify risk factors and build predictive models for early outcomes after surgery, gross-total resection, radiotherapeutic response, regrowth of tumors, remission after surgery, recurrence, hormonal outcomes, and more. By analyzing large and complex datasets, machine learning models can provide valuable insights and aid in making informed decisions for the treatment of pituitary adenomas.
content.da: Forudsigelige hypofysealgoritmer: Maskinlæringsalgoritmer har vist potentiale i at forudsige forskellige resultater hos patienter med hypofyseadenomer. Disse algoritmer kan identificere risikofaktorer og opbygge forudsigelsesmodeller for tidlige resultater efter operation, total fjernelse, strålebehandlingsrespons, tumorvækst, remission efter operation, tilbagefald, hormonelle resultater og mere. Ved at analysere store og komplekse datasæt kan maskinlæringsmodeller give værdifuld indsigt og bidrage til at træffe informerede beslutninger for behandlingen af hypofyseadenomer.
